name: JIAWANSHUN Digital Length Meter Counter Mechanical Length Counter Single Measure Wheel Unit in Feet Meter with Control Function 0-999999 Input 100-240V Output 12V
short_description: 【Application】This is a length measuring meter that can be used to measure the length of fabrics, posters, wires, pipes, films, edge banding machines, conveyor belts, etc. It is widely used in various industries such as textile, papermaking, printing, etc. The forward rotation means to increase the length, and the reverse rotation is to reduce the length.

【Change the measurement unit】Feet, inches, meters, yards, and other measurement units can be switched to meet the requirements of different industries and measurement units. The counting range of this meter is 0-999999, which can be accurate to 0.01, with high accuracy and a wide range.
【2 relay output】The length counter has 2 relay outputs and can simultaneously control 2 devices. It can be used not only to control alarms, but also to control solenoid valves, motors, etc

【Alarm&automatic reset】 The alarm can be connected and a preset value can be set in advance. After reaching this value, the alarm will sound, and according to the command, the machine will automatically reset.

【High quality】The wheels are made of rubber material, wear-resistant and anti-skid, and the display screen uses precise electronic components, which are not easily damaged; The 400rpm encoder operates stably, counts accurately, and rotates without noise.
